name: Catcheese
description:
Catcheese is a 3D alternative to CuteMaze.

Look for the code at Github.

Use arrows to move straight or sideways and the mouse to turn left or right. Joypad works as well.

Use space key or joypad’s X (B in SuperNES) button to leave a mark.

Escape key and joypad’s O (A in SuperNES) return to the menu – or quit if it’s already there.

I haven’t tested for Windows yet, but it might get the same behaviour as every other Godot game. Some feedback would be helpful.

Intro riff by Arĥimedeς ℳontegasppα.

See the changelog.
